title: nexomis/viral-assembly pipeline - params.input schema
description: Sample Sheet input for viral genome assembly

sample_name.description: Sample name must contains only alphanumeric chars or underscore

path_fq_R1.description: Path for R1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must end with .fastq, .fq, .spring optionally followed by .gz (or .z, .bz or .bzip2)

anyOf.description: Path for R2, if provided, cannot contain spaces and must end with .fastq, .fq optionally followed by .gz (or .z, .bz or .bzip2)
Path for fasta genome reference must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must end with .fasta, .fa, .fna optionally followed by .gz (or .z, .bz or .bzip2) [recquired if not 'skip_abacas']

host_kraken_db.description: Path of host organism kraken db in order to remore reads from host genome/transcriptome. [recquired if not 'skip_host_filtering']

assembly_type.description: Assmembly mode (used for: spades). Managed values are 'metaviral', 'rnaviral' and 'corona'; for other modes, refer to the spades documentation and provide the option as it should be added to the command line.

realign.description: Whether to realigne reads vs assembly
